Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Kimball/Diversey
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, Diversey, Kedzie, Belmont, and Kimball due to, street blockage at Kimball/Diversey.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kimball, Diversey, Kedzie, Belmont, and Kimball due to, street blockage at Kimball/Diversey.

Allow extra travel time.
